description:
A light, efficient pulley that rides easily on your harness. It features rotating side plates and a large attachment point that accommodates 2 carabiners. It uses the same design as the original Tethys, but features sealed ball bearings for higher efficiency and faster, more intensive use. Ideal for rigging a hauling system or managing crevasse rescues.

  • Aluminum side plates and sheave mounted on sealed ball bearings for excellent efficiency (92%)
  • Side plates are designed for use with a prusik (aramid cord suggested)
  • Fits rope diameters up to 13mm
  • Working load is 6kN (2x 3kN)
  • CE and UIAA approved
name: Camp Tethys Pro Small Mobile Pulley
